backend/main.mo: Defines Brand, Appliance, and Product types, seeds in‑memory Maps with sample data, and exposes a query to fetch brands for a given appliance.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme file defining color tokens and light/dark mode variables for the app UI.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI displaying service icons and showing a dialog with brands filtered by selected appliance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor, updating on identity changes.
Builds a mapping of appliance names to their brands and provides a helper to retrieve brands per appliance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching appliances, brands, and per‑appliance brands from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of light/dark OKLCH CSS variables plus global border and body styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context and imports global styles.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment variable types for Internet Identity and backend config.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, radii, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and known issues related to the VS Appliances service website.
